title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Someone who can create coin and mobile app for smart phone so the coin Will have in this app.Everybody will use only this one mostly and i do marketing and influencing people to use it.Off course big air drops to users Most Nice If it Will be Stable coin like usd or eur this project Will rock Can you do it ?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 06:14:45 PMSomeone who can create coin and mobile app for smart phone so the coin Will have in this app.Everybody will use only this one mostly and i do marketing and influencing people to use it.Off course big air drops to users Most Nice If it Will be Stable coin like usd or eur this project Will rock Can you do it ?I didn't understand anything about this. Are you asking that could someone build stable coin and app for you? What app? Stablecoin is not a normal token anyone can just pull off because they can make a token or a coin. That requires some next level resources.And why would anyone build you anything for free? Especially when you are not even explaining what you need.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 06:14:45 PMSomeone who can create coin and mobile app for smart phone so the coin Will have in this app.Everybody will use only this one mostly and i do marketing and influencing people to use it.Off course big air drops to users Most Nice If it Will be Stable coin like usd or eur this project Will rock Can you do it ?You have to be precised or detailed on what you want to be develop here. In any case, you can post it in this board:   Services. I don't understand the rush though, it might take some time for someone to make this mobile app of yours because it might not easy as it sound. Obviously it will have to be tested to make sure that everything is working as design. Also if you find a freelancer, just be careful about those newbies, not saying that they are scammer, but don't pay first or at least put the money in an escrow to be safe on both of you.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 06:14:45 PMSomeone who can create coin and mobile app for smart phone so the coin Will have in this app.Everybody will use only this one mostly and i do marketing and influencing people to use it.Off course big air drops to users Most Nice If it Will be Stable coin like usd or eur this project Will rock Can you do it ?You'll do the marketing? It's too ambitious to think of this plan and making it look like easy in executing it. The reality is you'll take time in doing it and you'll have to spend in all of it, how much budget you've got? Sorry to say but plans like this will remain a plan if you don't know where to start and where you're going to get your budget for funding it. Making project these days are easy if you've got money but making it known is harder and the hardest is to maintain it if ever you've got bunch of users and you're starting to get famous.

Obviously it will have to be tested to make sure that everything is working as design. Also if you find a freelancer, just be careful about those newbies, not saying that they are scammer, but don't pay first or at least put the money in an escrow to be safe on both of you.Yes i need someone to create mobile app.And in this app you can send and receive and hold and Also staking the Stable coin usd or eur or GBP Stable coin First need to create coin then the app becouse If there is so many options to use people don't want it people want one app and one coin then everybody will use itCan Do it ?

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: tabas on December 12, 2022, 09:53:04 AMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 06:14:45 PMSomeone who can create coin and mobile app for smart phone so the coin Will have in this app.Everybody will use only this one mostly and i do marketing and influencing people to use it.Off course big air drops to users Most Nice If it Will be Stable coin like usd or eur this project Will rock Can you do it ?You'll do the marketing? It's too ambitious to think of this plan and making it look like easy in executing it. The reality is you'll take time in doing it and you'll have to spend in all of it, how much budget you've got? Sorry to say but plans like this will remain a plan if you don't know where to start and where you're going to get your budget for funding it. Making project these days are easy if you've got money but making it known is harder and the hardest is to maintain it if ever you've got bunch of users and you're starting to get famous.Also with the stable coin, how? Stable coins are usually under the control of government or simply, fiat-based. Another thing is capital if OP is really serious with this one. You have to be practical; money and time would be consumed and his part of just promoting it won't be enough. I also agree with the procedures to be not as easy as 1,2,3. Things should be well planned and be mindful of the risk on not succeeding. If we would think of how many projects are being released on a monthly ,basis, the ratio of projects succeeding over projects which are failing, has a huge difference.An app would be done easily but creating a 'chai' would be another story. I suggest studying project procedures before coming to a vague idea if you are really that interested of creating one. Just my cents.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 12, 2022, 01:33:15 PMYes i need someone to create mobile app.And in this app you can send and receive and hold and Also staking the Stable coin usd or eur or GBP Stable coin First need to create coin then the app becouse If there is so many options to use people don't want it people want one app and one coin then everybody will use itCan Do it ?Sure, busd has 10+ billion  U.S. Treasury bills on their reserves and what was it again? Maybe 1 billion un USD. I can issue a high marketcap stablecoin if you give half of that for rhe reservesI will even develope the appi for free on top of that.But i am guessing that you are short of petty cash since you are asking that in here.Short answer is no. You are not getting your own stablecoin by asking. You will only get scammed if you get offers for that.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: The requirement you stated is not detailed enough and vague. Try to explain more the concept of your ideas so the concept is clearly addressed, in addition, you might be able to get a somewhat some market research through the discussion in this thread. Otherwise, if your thoughts are that a simple one coin and one app are enough to build the next-gen cryptocurrency platform, you are on the wrong board. If you want to pay the development fees via bitcoin, post a thread on Services board, if it is an altcoin, go to Marketplace (altcoins) board.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: Yatsan on December 12, 2022, 01:39:02 PMQuote from: tabas on December 12, 2022, 09:53:04 AMYou'll do the marketing? It's too ambitious to think of this plan and making it look like easy in executing it. The reality is you'll take time in doing it and you'll have to spend in all of it, how much budget you've got? Sorry to say but plans like this will remain a plan if you don't know where to start and where you're going to get your budget for funding it. Making project these days are easy if you've got money but making it known is harder and the hardest is to maintain it if ever you've got bunch of users and you're starting to get famous.Also with the stable coin, how? Stable coins are usually under the control of government or simply, fiat-based. Another thing is capital if OP is really serious with this one. You have to be practical; money and time would be consumed and his part of just promoting it won't be enough. I also agree with the procedures to be not as easy as 1,2,3. Things should be well planned and be mindful of the risk on not succeeding. If we would think of how many projects are being released on a monthly ,basis, the ratio of projects succeeding over projects which are failing, has a huge difference.An app would be done easily but creating a 'chai' would be another story. I suggest studying project procedures before coming to a vague idea if you are really that interested of creating one. Just my cents.He thinks that it's an easy task to make his own stable coin and then he'll just withdraw real money from it. If this is done before, I think he might give it a true shot to it and there's a chance that he'll successful when the market wasn't yet too regulated at all.The government won't think anything on him and his project even it will be named after a fiat or his local currency. But today, it's just too different to look at because the government's eyes are over it.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 12, 2022, 01:33:15 PMYes i need someone to create mobile app.And in this app you can send and receive and hold and Also staking the Stable coin usd or eur or GBP Stable coin First need to create coin then the app becouse If there is so many options to use people don't want it people want one app and one coin then everybody will use itCan Do it ?Who is going to pay the interest generated to users staking on your app? This income must come from somewhere. How are you going to earn money with this app?These ideas seem too simplistic at this point we are in cryptocurrency, where there are many exchanges and staking platforms accepting hundreds of different cryptocurrencies, besides the fact there isn't a clear indicative on how it's going to be profitable for you, as the app operator.

comments.author: glendall
comments.body: what are you going to market? what you want here is not quite understandable , try to explain in detail what you want right ?because from the replies of previous friends there is no core point of what you want?

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Quote from: glendall on December 15, 2022, 01:04:28 PMwhat are you going to market? what you want here is not quite understandable , try to explain in detail what you want right ?because from the replies of previous friends there is no core point of what you want?What OP want is, create a coin and an app. That app will have function as staking, buying & sell that coin. People who staking that coin will get the reward and OP will heavily advertize that coin. The problem is that kind of staking is already lot there. Just like Defi, which booming on 2021 but now it's almost dead. Hoping that coin could stable also very very hard, as the reward from staking, people will dump or sell it on market, so in the long run, that coin price will keep low and lower.

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: First, You must understand the difference between a token and a coin. A coin has its own blockchain, while a token does not have its own blockchain. For example, eth is a coin, and mana and sandbox are tokensThe token is easy to create even a kid can create it. You don't need to learn solidity language for this you can take source codes from the internet. While creating a blockchain is difficult and you need to hire a dev who can do this for you.Second, building a mobile application costs between $25,000to $40,000 ( according to some sites) and you think after spending so much money someone will hand over to you his project for marketing? C'mon bro.
